title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing charity in a dream

preview.html: Charity in dreams: Seeing charity has many symbols and different meanings according to jurists, and the majority of interpreters agreed on the desirability of seeing charity and giving and paying zakat. On this topic and in this article we take a look at all the details and cases with more explanations and clarifications. Charity in a dream Seeing charity expresses the performance of worship and duties, pushing and steadfast opinion, good integrity, achieving goals and objectives, following common sense, abandoning entertainment and temptation, and turning to God with good deeds and spending. the money. For what is beneficial in this world and the hereafter. And whoever sees that he is giving charity, he will take money for the sake of others, and will not be stingy with those close to him, and deal with goodness and justice. Charity may be prohibited, as a person gives charity for alcohol, gambling, and dead meat, and this vision indicates the invalidity of work and corruption. Intention and the passage of financial difficulties or crises related to trade, and this vision is considered a sign of committing transgressions and sins and violating the method and the law. Whoever sees that he is giving charity in secret, and this is called secret charity that no one declares, this indicates sincere repentance, guidance, and a return to reason and righteousness. And seeking forgiveness and seeking forgiveness. Charity in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that giving alms and paying zakat, whether in a dream or in wakefulness, is a praiseworthy matter, and a symbol of abundant sustenance, prosperity, and an increase in religion and the world. The interpretation of seeing charity is related to the condition of the dreamer. Whoever is knowledgeable and sees that he is giving charity. This indicates knowledge that benefits others, and the knowledge that he transmits to people and is approved by the merchant is evidence. Increased profit, sale of goods, abundance of goods and livelihood, and shows the poor an abundant life and livelihood. Among the symbols of charity is that it indicates honesty, disagreement, mastery of work, fulfillment of covenant, and repayment of debt. Whoever sees voluntary charity, this indicates that he is doing a good job to prevent sadness and distress to achieve the goal. The purpose, and the vision, shows the abundance of goodness, blessings, and gifts that the dreamer receives in his life. If the charity is to feed the poor or help the poor, then this is evidence of salvation from distress and worry, salvation from illness and danger, and achieving safety and reassurance after fear and anxiety. Charity in a dream by Al-Osaimi Al-Osaimi says that Charity indicates the acquisition of pleasures and benefits, improving living conditions, reaping fruits and wealth, adhering to prayer times, not neglecting the rights of others, and performing duties and acts of worship without delay or interruption. Whoever sees that he is giving charity, this indicates safety from the enemy, despair and fear in the heart, renewed hopes in him, achievement of goals and objectives, and freedom from evil and dangers. Paying zakat on behalf of the dead means a good stay with his Lord, achieving the goal, accepting supplication, and zakat, The answer to supplication, and whoever witnesses it feeding the needy, this indicates relief from worry and anxiety, salvation from adversity and adversity, and change. Circumstances are for the better. Charity in the dream of single people. Seeing alms in a dream symbolizes cleansing from sins and misdeeds, and purifying one’s soul.

Charity in a dream for Al-Osaimi Al-Osaimi says that charity indicates the acquisition of pleasures and benefits, improving living conditions, reaping fruits and wealth, adhering to prayer times, not neglecting the rights of others, and performing duties and worship without delaying interruption. .And whoever sees that he is giving alms, this indicates safety from the enemy, despair and fear in the heart, renewal of hopes in it, achievement of goals and purposes, and liberation from evils and dangers. And paying zakat on behalf of the dead means a good stay with his Lord, achieving the intention, accepting supplication, zakat, and answering the supplication, and whoever witnesses him feeding the needy, this indicates relief from worry and anxiety, deliverance from hardships and hardships, and changing circumstances for the better. title: Interpretation of a dream about my beloved’s birthday for single women

preview.html: The meaning of seeing my beloved’s birthday for a single woman. A single girl sees her boyfriend in a dream while celebrating his birthday with him. He declares his intense love for her and will marry her in the near future. Either if the girl sees that she is celebrating the birthday of her traveling lover. This indicates the return of her lover from travels. And when the girl saw If an unmarried woman is celebrating her lover’s birthday, this celebration was also disturbed. This indicates that there are problems between them, and if she is engaged to him, this indicates the cancellation of the engagement, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of seeing a birthday in a dream for a single girl. When we see that he has a birthday party and many Many people come to her. Perhaps she indicated that this girl will attend her engagement soon. God knows best. If a single woman sees a Christmas party without songs, this is a sign that her life is full of happiness. She saw the Christmas party and the single girl felt fun and happy. Good news comes to her that problems It will disappear and you will not be harmed by it much if she was already suffering from it during this vision, and God knows best. What if the single woman gets engaged and sees that her fiancé comes at Christmas and gives her a gift. This indicates that she will perform her wedding ceremonies with the utmost skill, and God knows best. And if she sees someone close to her coming And he gives her a gift at the birthday party. Perhaps there are feelings on her part, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about Christmas for unmarried and divorced women. Interpretation of seeing a birthday in a dream for a married woman. In the event that a married woman sees in a dream that she is seeing a birthday party, there are many people who They feel happy. It indicates good news about her husband’s work and that he will obtain a prominent position, God willing. In the event that she sees many guests coming to the Christmas party in her dream. It may be a sign of her children’s success in school, if she already has children studying, she will celebrate them And God knows best. A Christmas party in a dream is a sign that a woman will witness the wedding of someone close to her, who may be her brother or sister. When she sees a Christmas party in a dream, it is a sign for her of the engagement or marriage of one of her children. If she has reached the age of Marriage is the time of vision, God knows best. The vision of Christmas suggests that the dreamer will see excellence and success in her academic life, God willing. It is believed that a women’s birthday party is good news for excellence in the field of work. Interpretation of seeing a birthday in a dream about a man and its meaning. Celebrating Christmas in a man’s dream, Which symbolizes his return from absence, perhaps he is on a trip, and God knows best. If he dreams that he is going to a birthday party for a young girl. It indicates that God will comfort him in the coming season and he must continue to pray. And seeing a sick man being at a birthday party A young girl is a good sign of the end of the illness and recovery, God willing. And in the case of a man attending the birthday party of his partner’s daughter. This indicates that he will be released soon if he is already imprisoned, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. When you attend a birthday party for a man in a dream about a familiar face. It indicates To the source of livelihood

title: Interpretation of dreams: My sister is pregnant and married to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that my sister was pregnant and married. For a person to see in a dream that his married sister is pregnant carries with it many connotations and meanings, such as what symbolizes kindness, blessing, gift, and other things that bring nothing but problems, worries, and sorrows to its owner, and the jurists. Its interpretation depends on the condition of the dreamer and the events mentioned in the dream, and we will clarify all the interpretations related to the dream of my sister being pregnant and married in the next article. I dreamed that my sister was pregnant and married. Commentators explained many meanings and symbols related to following up on the married sister’s pregnancy, which are as follows: If one sees in a dream that His married sister is pregnant, then he will reap a lot of material gains and become wealthy in the near future. If the dreamer sees that her elderly married sister is pregnant, this is clear evidence that this sister does not memorize her Quranic words and does not maintain her prayers, as she is in love with the world and seeks her demise. Enjoy it and must return to God before it is too late. I dreamed that my sister was pregnant and married to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained many of the meanings and associations associated with seeing a married sister’s pregnancy in a dream, the most important of which are the following: If the dreamer is unmarried and she sees in her dream that her married sister Pregnant, then God will change her condition from poverty to wealth and extravagance in the coming period. If the dreamer is working and sees in a dream that her married sister is pregnant, she will receive a promotion that will make her a better place and raise her standard of living. I dreamed that my married sister was pregnant in a man’s dream symbolizes that he will receive His share of the property of one of his deceased relatives and he will soon become wealthy. I dreamed that my sister was pregnant and married to a single woman. Interpretation scholars explained many of the meanings and connotations associated with seeing a sister’s pregnancy during marriage in a single woman’s dream, as follows: If a girl sees in her dream that her married sister is pregnant, feelings of sadness And sadness, this is a clear sign of pessimism, and that she sees no good in the future, which leads to the accumulation of psychological pressure on her. If a virgin sees in her dream that her married sister is pregnant, this is clear evidence that she hopes that God will bless her sister with good offspring. Interpretation of a dream about a sister A married woman carrying twins in a dream for a girl who has never been married before symbolizes that her sister cannot manage her life well, which leads to shortcomings in her family and a feeling of sadness and distress. I dreamed that my sister is pregnant and married to a married woman. Watching a married sister being pregnant in a dream for the wife symbolizes many Interpretations, the most important of which are the following: If the dreamer is married and sees in her dream that her married sister is pregnant, her pregnancy will be light without any problems and she will witness a great facilitation in the birth process. If a married woman sees in her dream that her unmarried working sister is pregnant, that sister will receive a promotion. In her job, she will reach the peak of glory and will be able to achieve all the goals she wants to achieve. I dreamed that my sister is pregnant and married to a pregnant woman. If the dreamer is pregnant and sees in her dream that her sister is pregnant, this is clear evidence

title: Interpretation of rice in a dream Seeing cooked rice in a dream is for Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: The dream of rice for an unmarried girl The dream of a pregnant woman, a married woman, a divorced woman, a man, red rice in a bowl, and eating white rice cooked with meat, according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq and others. Rice in a dream Rice in a dream is one of those strange dreams that we do not see all the time in a dream It carries many important signs and clues that the dreamer must be aware of, as rice is one of the crops that cannot be done in life, and which nourishes the body with all the benefits and necessary energy. It is possible that dreaming of rice in a dream has many reasons, including: That constant thinking about food and other things. Imam Al-Sadiq explained to us in his interpretations and books on dreams about seeing rice in a dream in many interpretations that differ from one person to another and that differ from the state of the dream and the details that were fully realized. Interpretation of rice in a dream is related to the appearance of rice in a dream, according to To interpretations of ancient books, good health and long life. It is said that the interpretation of seeing it in a dream is related to the circumstances of its appearance, and if its sight is coupled with a feeling of hunger, then this warns you of great sadness that will also come to you. A good or bad dream is also related to the purity and cleanliness of rice grains, or vice versa. If you see white and clean rice, this symbolizes that you will soon be able to build new friendships that will be useful and durable. If you see rice growing, your dream symbolizes the prosperity of your business. If you see That you are buying rice, it means that you are investing your money in the right place. As for cooking rice, it means that there is someone who needs your attention and gifts. If you dream that you are eating rice, this symbolizes that your wealth will increase over time and that good days await you. If you see that someone He eats rice, this symbolizes that the person you saw in the dream is in good health and that his life will be prosperous. Whoever sees in a dream that he is eating cooked rice, this indicates fatigue and great effort that he will make to obtain money and abundant profit. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is storing Cooked rice, this is a sign that he will collect the money he earns with the aim of investing it in large projects that will bring him greater benefit. Whoever dreams that he is adding milk to cooked rice, this indicates that the dreamer will face many problems and difficulties and must beware of enemies. Whoever dreams that he sees in front of him A bowl full of cooked rice indicates the abundance of money that awaits him in the near future. In general, cooked rice in a dream symbolizes the huge amounts of money that the dreamer has earned or will earn. It indicates growth and abundance of money. If the dreamer is a woman and sees in her dream that she is cooking rice, this is a clear indication of the high positions that she will occupy, whether in her work or in her social life. Whoever dreams of a woman cooking rice for him, this is an indication that he will meet a woman who will bring him Happiness and pleasure, apart from the material gains that he will obtain with its help. Interpretation of rice in a dream for a man: A man who sees rice in a dream is evidence of

title: Learn about the interpretation of a husband’s dream of having sex with his wife according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a husband having sex with his wife in a dream. Seeing intercourse in a dream is one of the strange visions that leaves its owner confused about it. This vision has many connotations, including praiseworthy and hateful, and what concerns us in this article is to mention all the cases, details, and connotations. Dreaming of a husband having sex with his wife. Learn about the interpretation of a dream of a husband having sex with his wife in Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of a husband having sex with his wife. Seeing a group in a dream expresses the psychological, emotional and moral state of the individual, and the fluctuations that occur in these situations from time to time. If he sees If a person has intercourse with his wife, this indicates his relationship with her, and how he controls his personal affairs and the feelings within him, and expresses them in a healthy way or in a way that requires some discipline, discipline, and flexibility. If you see that he interacts with his wife with more tenderness and romance, this is an indication of a strong emotional need to practice this relationship better, or a deficiency that the person is trying to avoid by adding some kind of vitality to his relationship. . Life and privacy. If a person sees that he does not find a suitable place for intercourse with his wife, this indicates the presence of someone who violates his privacy or interferes in the affairs of his life, steals his comfort, and disrupts his life, which affects him negatively and causes. He loses his balance and achieves the desired rhythm. According to Sheikh Al-Nabulsi, the vision of intercourse with the wife is a sign of status, rank, guardianship, and control, and if there is a sperm during the marriage, then this vision is invalid and has no explanation, and its owner must be washed and consecrated at the appropriate time. Matters of reality. But if the dreamer sees that his wife is one of the women of Paradise and he has intercourse with her, this is evidence that he will attain a high rank and position, great benefit, achieve high gains, and attain a large share of religious sciences. And the Sharia, and achieving great success in achieving a balance between the demands of the world and the provisions of the Sharia. Interpretation of the dream of a husband having intercourse with his wife in Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of the vision of intercourse in a dream that this vision expresses the satisfaction of needs, the achievement of goals and objectives, and assuming high positions and a great position. If there is a dream In this vision, it is necessary to wash and purify, and to see visions that have no explanation, as they are among the obsessions of the soul and control over reality in the world of dreams. The vision of a husband’s union with his wife expresses the fulfillment of requirements and what the person seeks, honesty in work and perseverance in achieving goals, skill in art or craft, precision and good planning in all matters of work and life. This vision also indicates mutual affection and love between the spouses and marital life. Happiness, stability, satisfaction, psychological compatibility, and the ability to find solutions to difficult issues that occupy a large space in the opinion of the fortuneteller. And whoever sees that his wife is comfortable and happy in her intercourse, this indicates a period of prosperity in which the man will achieve a lot of gain and profit, achieve all his goals and reach a high rank. And if he sees One of them is that he had intercourse with his wife, and she seemed unfamiliar to him, as this symbolizes the next year of his life, in

title: Interpretation of a dream about olive oil and its effects

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about olive oil in a dream: There is no doubt that this vision in general is considered one of the promising visions that indicate goodness and nourishment for those who see this dream. It also includes many other meanings and interpretations, as it varies according to the social status of the fortuneteller and what appears in the dream. In light of this, we will study in the following lines the interpretation of the dream about olives. Oil in a dream.Interpretation of a dream about olive oil in a dreamSince this vision differs in the interpretations, meanings and connotations it contains, based on the social position of the fortuneteller, and this is what many dream interpreters have worked hard to explain, and based on that, we will explain to you in the following lines the interpretation. From the dream of olive oil in a dream, which is: If an unmarried girl sees olive oil in a dream. This is a sign of good luck, which may include working or earning a living. In addition, if an unmarried girl sees olive oil in a dream, this is evidence of Marriage. But if a married woman sees this vision in a dream. It is evidence of worries and problems that will go away, God willing. Also, seeing oil in a dream for a married woman. It is a sign of very good things that will come. But if he sees oil, and it tastes good in the dream, then this The dream is a sign of happiness. To see yourself drinking this oil in a dream means, in some interpretations, that you are seeking knowledge and great understanding and succeeding in it. Likewise, if someone sees in his dream that he is giving olive oil to someone he knows. It shows a good relationship with this The person and that he actually wishes them success. This vision is considered one of the most promising visions in most cases and includes many meanings and interpretations, so that they differ based on the scenes that you see. In a dream, some of which have good suggestions, which augur well. The dreamer, and in this context we take into account the interpretation of offering olive oil in a dream to a married woman, which is explained in the following lines: If a married woman sees in a dream that her husband gave her a lot of oil and she ate it quickly. This dream is evidence that her husband will give her a lot of money in the future. Also, if a married woman sees in her dream that she is buying a lot of olive oil and does not find it easily. It is evidence that you will see a difficult time in life, which will get rid of it soon. title: Interpretation of a dream about thick hair on the anus in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about thick hair on the anus in a dream and tireless efforts to reach the truth of the dream and interpret it well, which is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about thick hair on the anus in a dream. Seeing thick hair on the anus in a dream can indicate sins and transgressions that the dreamer committed in those days. It can Seeing thick hair in the anus indicates that the person with poor eyesight has a bad reputation or is delving into the symptoms of others. Seeing thick hair on the anus in a dream may indicate a problem that the person with the vision may face in his work at that time and needs to seek help from God. It is possible that seeing thick hair in the anus in a dream indicates the dreamer’s inability to bear responsibility in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams about intercourse with a strange woman from the anus in a dream. If a person sees that he is having intercourse with an unknown woman from the anus Anus in a dream, as this may indicate bad actions committed by this person, and he must repent and return to God, Blessed and Most High. This dream could be a sign of financial crises that the dreamer may face or debts that he may suffer from. It is possible that this vision indicates On bad events that the dreamer will face in his life, and God knows best. A dream of anal intercourse with a strange woman in a dream may indicate that the morals of the visionary are not good and that he must repent to the Most High, Blessed God. Interpretation of a dream about a piece of meat coming out of the anus in a dream in the event that he dreams of a piece coming out Of meat from the anus in a dream, this may indicate some problems and difficulties in his life at that time. Anyone who dreams of a piece of meat coming out of the anus can indicate negative things that the dreamer may face during that period. Seeing a piece of meat may indicate Coming out of the anus in a dream indicates that something bad will happen to the dreamer or an illness that he may suffer from for a period of time and he must seek God’s help. Seeing a piece of human flesh coming out of the anus in a dream may indicate the sorrows and worries that the dreamer faces in his life during this time, And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the intestines coming out of the anus in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that the intestines coming out of the anus may indicate good skin that may come to the dreamer in the corresponding period, thanks to God. The intestines coming out of the anus in a dream may indicate a large amount of money. Money and an extensive diet will be acquired by the dreamer during this time. Dreaming of intestines coming out of the anus in a dream may indicate problems that the dreamer may face and that he will soon get rid of, thanks to God. Dreaming of intestines coming out of the anus in a dream may indicate changes that are occurring. In the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about pebbles coming out of the anus in a dream. In the case of a dream about pebbles coming out of the anus in a dream, it may indicate the presence of unnatural things in the dreamer’s life in those days, and God knows best. Anyone can dream that pebbles Coming out of the anus in a dream means something bad

title: Interpretation of seeing the number nine in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the number 9 in a dream through the website: Looking at the website roy2a.com, the number 9 is the odd numbers. When he sees numbers in a dream, the dreamer often wonders about the meaning of this vision through search engines, and it is one of the important topics that scholars have discussed with dream interpreters due to its spread. Today, through this article, we will present the most important thing that major scholars have come up with, dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin. And Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen about. Seeing the number 9 in a dream for singles, married women, pregnant women and men, follow us. Interpretation of seeing the number 9 in a dream Seeing the number 9 in one’s dreams has many different interpretations, including it being a sign of a lack of religion in my opinion and committing prohibited and evil things. Seeing the number 9 indicates In a dream, this is the appearance of peace after a long dispute or controversy. One of the wise interpretations of seeing the number 9 in a dream is approaching marriage or pregnancy, success, distinction, fulfillment of desires, and satisfaction of desires. Seeing the number 9 indicates a sick person whose illness will pass soon and he will recover. The number 9 in a dream indicates the arrival of the dreamer. In actions that harm people and spread corruption. Seeing the number 9 in a dream indicates bad friends around the dreamer or hardships and difficulties that he will face. The number 9 in a dream indicates the ability to help others and meet their needs. Some commentators indicate that seeing the number 9 in a dream is a sign of achievement and endings. Positive, because it is the last number in the single digit. Interpretation of seeing the number 9 in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing the number 9 in a dream is a sign that the fortuneteller expects something important and special that will happen to him in the near future and that he will be happy about. Seeing the number 9 also indicates marriage or the engagement of a single person. Whether a girl or a young man. Interpretation of seeing the number 9 in a dream for a single woman. Seeing the number 9 in a single woman’s dream indicates the marriage that she will enjoy soon. Seeing the number 9 in a dream indicates the presence of an unmarried woman who will achieve her goals and ambitions that she was striving to achieve in the previous period, whether On a personal or practical level. Seeing the number 9 in an engaged girl’s dream is an indication of the preparations she is making for her new home. Interpretation of seeing the number 9 in a dream for a married woman. Seeing the number 9 in a dream for a married woman is a sign of her imminent pregnancy. Seeing the number 9 in a dream indicates a married woman’s stable and happy life. She enjoys it with her husband and family. Interpretation of seeing the number 9 in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing the number 9 in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the end of her pregnancy and the approaching date of her birth. Seeing the number 9 in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she is pregnant to get rid of all problems and obstacles, whether psychological or physical. Interpretation of seeing the number 9 In a man’s dream, seeing the number 9 in a man’s dream signifies the earliest date for his engagement or marriage. Seeing the number 9 in a man’s dream means seeing the number 9 in a man’s dream will succeed in his field of work or study. The number 9 in a sick man’s dream indicates the earliest recovery and recovery.

title: Interpretation of a dream about the birth of an only child and its interpretation of good and evil

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the birth of an unmarried boy: One of the things that can make a pregnant woman and wife happy is that she can give birth to a child who recognizes her and will be supportive of her and his father, and among the dreams that arouse curiosity in their interpretation, and one of the interpretations of these dreams is the interpretation of dreams about a boy being born for single people. It is considered one of the visions in which interpreters differed and which is important. Those interested in dreams in general and single people in particular, but many doubted that this vision is a good dream and that it is one of the visions worthy of praise. Ibn Sirin on the interpretation of a dream about the birth of a single boyInterpretation of a dream about the birth of an unmarried boyInterpretation of the birth of an unmarried boy is one of the dreams that arouses curiosity, and you will learn about this through Location is different: An unmarried girl may see that she is giving birth to a child in her dream, and this is a good dream because this girl will soon get out of trouble and will enjoy a stable life. Also, one of the visions of the birth of a boy in an unmarried girl’s dream is that she may leave her family and travel far away and may not be able to stay with them For some time. There is another interpretation that the birth of a boy in a dream could be a victory for her over her enemies. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of an unmarried boy by her lover. A girl can see in a dream that she is giving birth to a boy from the man she loves, this is evidence that she will soon marry this man. A man and begins a new life. There is also another interpretation of this vision because it shows that she will experience good things in her life. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a child for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to an unmarried boy. If a pregnant woman sees herself giving birth to a boy in a dream, this is evidence that she will give birth to a handsome son. As for If she sees herself giving birth to a boy and the woman is at the beginning of pregnancy, this is evidence that she will face health problems and must follow appropriate treatment. It is possible that this vision for a pregnant woman is a sign from God that the birth will be easy and without problems, thanks to God. Whoever sees in her dream that she is giving birth to a child A male, and in fact she is not pregnant, this indicates that this woman will give birth soon. There is another interpretation that says that this woman will get rid of a major problem facing her married life. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of an unmarried boy for Ibn Shaheen, according to Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of a dream about a boy for singles. Perhaps she is entering a new phase of her life, but she is afraid. The other interpretation is that if an unmarried girl gives birth to a boy afflicted with a defect or problem, this is evidence of the death of one of her relatives. There is another opinion by Ibn Shaheen that if an engaged, unmarried girl sees herself giving birth to a boy, this is evidence that she will soon marry her fiancé. It indicates her exit from the marriage. The problems surrounding her and the beginning of stability in her life. In another interpretation by Ibn Shaheen for a married woman, if she gave birth in a dream and her baby died, this indicates the occurrence of a major problem, but God saved her from it. If a married woman sees that she has given birth to a boy with a birth defect, this indicates She is hiding a secret from her husband. Ibn Shaheen largely agreed with Ibn Sirin’s interpretations, in which a woman’s birth symbolizes goodness, pleasure, and obtaining good news. In another interpretation,

preview.html: White coat in a dream: If a person sees in a dream that he is wearing a white coat. This indicates his honesty and transparency in all aspects of his life, and indicates his sincerity in speech and his noble feelings. What if she sees in her dream a girl in a white coat. This is a sign that he has a good personality and loves good things. Everyone. If a married woman sees a white coat in her dream, this is a sign of the goodness of her heart and the purity of her mind. And if you see a white coat in a pregnant woman’s dream, it is a sign that she and her fetus will emerge from childbirth fine, and God is the Most High. You may be interested in: Interpretation of seeing a coat In a dream in detail, a white coat in the dream of an unmarried woman. If an unmarried girl sees a white coat, this is a sign of her high status at work, and also a sign that she will get married soon. If she sees herself wearing a coat, this is a sign of her success in study or work. And in the event that she sees that she Her coat being torn is evidence of her poverty and failure in her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If she sees a black coat, this is a sign of the exhaustion and exhaustion she is experiencing in life, and that she is unable to bear responsibility. A white coat in a dream for a fiancée. If a girl sees an engaged woman in a dream, then A white coat is a sign that her fiancé loves her and that he is deeply attached to her. But if she sees herself wearing an unclean coat. This is a sign that a bad person is trying to get close to her, so she should beware of any strangers. Seeing a married woman in a white coat in a dreamIf a woman sees A married woman in her dream is wearing a white coat. This is evidence of her stability in her life and that she is living a happy married life. If the coat is made of leather, this is a sign of the strength of her character and her ability to bear responsibility. If a married woman sees in her dream a man’s coat. This is a sign of her ability To bear problems and difficulties and manage her affairs with ease. Seeing an expensive coat in a married woman’s dream indicates her calm, trouble-free married life. A white coat in a dream for a man. If one sees a white coat in his dream, this is a sign that he will receive a promotion at work, and God is Most High. And I know. If a man sees that he is buying a coat in a dream, this is a sign of wealth and very good. It is possible that the vision indicates that he will get married soon, and God knows best. A white coat in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees a white coat in her dream, this is a sign that Her affairs will be at ease during pregnancy. It is a sign that her birth will be easy, and she and her fetus will emerge in good health. And if he sees in a dream that the coat is made of wool. This is a sign that her life is very stable and calm, and that God is Most High and Most Knowing. It was also said that a pregnant woman sees herself in A dream in which she is wearing a linen coat. This is a sign of her feeling of security and peace in her life. Even though the coat she saw in the dream was cut off. This is a sign of the difficulty of her birth, and God knows best. What if she saw in a dream that her husband gave her a coat. This is a sign As her due date approaches
